Wolfblade:
She turned to Malice and smiled. "Yeah, it was good. But what are we 
going to do with the kids?"  She looked down at Elita and over to the 
little kid laying on Malice.  She sighed and looked back up at the 
ceiling.

Camoflage::
She tossed and turned over. She jumped up and off the hammock. She 
landed on her feet, wide awake and looking around frantically. She 
ran to the door and pawed at it. "Open, open, open."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice awakes and turns his head toward Wolfblade.  She had awaken, 
and was whispering to Elita.  He glanced over to Camoflage, who was 
snuggled close to his mid section.  He smiled and pat the child on 
the head gently, then turned to Wolfblade.
> "Good evening.  Sleep well I take it?"
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She woke up and looked down at the bot licking her.  She leaned 
> forward and took a good look at the little bot. She whispered, "You 
> just keep it quiet."  She glanced over at the others, "THe others 
are 
> still asleep. Let them sleep. OK?"  She patted the little bot on 
the 
> head and smiled at her. SHe put her arm around Elita and nuzzled 
her 
> close. 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Elita::
> > 
> > Elit woke up and she widley smiled to Wolfblade, she licked her 
and 
> > nmuzzled against her.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > A dream:
> > >  
> > > Neutronics, the brother of the soon to become infamous 
> > Megatronics, ran down the street.  He heard a commotion near his 
> > apartment he, Megatronics, and their adoptive sister, Organics 
> > shared.  Several bots were gathered around the door, watching 
> > Megatronics stand over Organics.  Not menacing her, protecting 
> her.  
> > His brother was struggling with an appearently drunk, tenticuled, 
> > robot of unknown origin.  Neutronics pushed the gatering at the 
> door 
> > aside and rushed the attacker.  He was knocked to the ground, but 
> > megatronics was able to knock the attacker away.  The mystery bot 
> > escaped through the window and into the night.  Megatronics 
helped 
> > his brother to his feet.  They pull Organics up and Neutronics 
shut 
> > the door and rushed to his sister's side.  As he held her hand to 
> > reassure, his hand passed through her's, and the room grew black, 
> > Neutronics looked around, and instead of his protective older 
> > brother, the mighty Megatron stood rusting and laughing.  
> Neutronics 
> > covered his audio
> > >  recepters, until Megatron opened fire on them both.
> > >  
> > >  
> > > Malice jolted awake, dropping the alarm clock in his hand.  
> > Instantly, a monofiliment wire shot from his wrist.  it bounced 
off 
> > his index finger, pierced the clock housing, bounced off the 
> > insides, and exited to stick in the wall.  The clock slide down 
the 
> > wire, till it rested on the floor.  He retracted the wire and 
> looked 
> > around.  He saw Wolfblade was awake.  He picked Camoflage up 
> gently, 
> > rested her in his lap, and swung his legs over the edge of the 
> cargo 
> > net to face Wolfblade.
> > > :Good afternoon, I think."
> > > 
> > > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > Camoflage::
> > > 
> > > She purred slightly as Malice stroked her head and nuzzled even 
> > > closer to him.  Her mind was dreaming of past times. In her 
> sleep, 
> > > she muttered, " No, I don't want to go mommy. I can fight. I 
> won't 
> > > get rust sickness. Honest, I can stay, please let me stay 
> mommy."  
> > > She whimpered a bit and calmed down. 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Wolfblade::
> > > She moved and rolled onto her back to see what had scratched 
her. 
> > It 
> > > was Elita. She gently put her arm around the little sleeping 
bot 
> > and 
> > > sighed. SHe very gently stroked Elita's head and shoulders and 
> > > wondered how long the little bot had been there.  She thought 
to 
> > > herself, Why do kids come around bots who have little to no 
> > > experience with kids? I wonder if they do it on purpose just to 
> > raise 
> > > a bot's oil pressure.
> > > She turned her head to see that Malice had a little one 
sleeping 
> > at 
> > > his side as well.  She wondered why the kids came to his room 
to 
> > > sleep. THen something else occured to her. If kids could sneek 
in 
> > to 
> > > this place, how easy would it be for an enemiy to sneek in and 
> > kill 
> > > them. Especially when they were sleeping. This thought 
disturbed 
> > her 
> > > enough to not let her fall back to sleep. She would wait for 
the 
> > kids 
> > > to wake up, then address the matter with Malice. 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > "In the name of God, I banish these souls of the evil undead 
into 
> > damnation.  May God have mercy, for I have none.  In Jesus' Holy 
> > Name, Amen." -Rawl, Hellsing-RPG
